mapper.select: SELECT IF(COUNT(DISTINCT u.dept_id)=1,TRUE,FALSE ) AS bool FROM tb_meeting m JOIN tb_user u ON JSON_CONTAINS ( m.members, CAST( u.id AS CHAR ) ) WHERE m.uuid=#{uuid} AND u.status = 1

SELECT m.uuid, m.creator_id AS creatorId, IF(creator_id=#{userId},"true","false") AS isCreator, m.title, u.name, DATE_FORMAT( m.date, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS date, m.place, DATE_FORMAT( m.START, '%H:%i' ) AS start, DATE_FORMAT( m.END, '%H:%i' ) AS end, m.type, m.status, m.desc, m.instance_id AS instanceId FROM tb_meeting m JOIN tb_user u ON m.creator_id = u.id WHERE m.id =#{id} AND u.status = 1
select count(*) from tb_meeting_room where status=1
